AssignProject.title: 指定云数据库实例的所属项目

CreateAccountUser.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAccountUser
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-9d0p****",
    "UserName": "test_user",
    "Password": "Abc@123...",
    "MongoUserPassword": "Abc@123...",
    "UserDesc": "测试用户",
    "AuthRole": [
        {
            "Mask": 0,
            "NameSpace": "collection"
        }
    ]
}
CreateAccountUser.title: 自定义账号

CreateDBInstance.document: 当前示例仅适合4.0版本，其余版本请严格参考传入参数中各版本说明项
CreateDBInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDBInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "VpcId": "vpc-0akbol5v",
    "GoodsNum": "1",
    "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-2",
    "ProjectId": "0",
    "MachineCode": "HIO10G",
    "Period": "1",
    "ClusterType": "REPLSET",
    "Volume": "250",
    "MongoVersion": "MONGO_40_WT",
    "NodeNum": "3",
    "ReplicateSetNum": "1",
    "Memory": "4",
    "SubnetId": "subnet-fyrtjbqw",
    "Password": "pwd123456"
}
CreateDBInstance.title: 创建包年包月的云数据库实例

CreateDBInstanceHour.document: 当前示例仅适合4.0版本，其余版本请严格参考传入参数中各版本说明项
CreateDBInstanceHour.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDBInstanceHour
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3",
    "GoodsNum": "1",
    "Clone": "1",
    "Memory": "4",
    "ClusterType": "REPLSET",
    "Volume": "250",
    "NodeNum": "2",
    "ReplicateSetNum": "1",
    "MachineCode": "HIO10G",
    "MongoVersion": "MONGO_40_WT"
}
CreateDBInstanceHour.title: 创建云数据库实例（按量计费）

}

        "ClusterType": "REPLSET",
        "InstanceEnumParams": [

                    "snappy",
                    "zlib",

                    "none"
                ],
                "NeedRestart": "1",

                "Status": 1,

            }
        ],
        "InstanceIntegerParams": [
            {
                "CurrentValue": "100",
                "DefaultValue": "100",
                "Max": "65536",
                "Min": "0",
                "NeedRestart": "0",
                "ParamName": "operation.profiling.slowOpThresholdMs",
                "Status": 1,
                "Tips": [
                    "",
                    "the slow operation time threshold, in milliseconds."
                ],
                "Unit": "",
                "ValueType": "integer"
            },
            {

                "Min": "1",
                "NeedRestart": "0",
                "ParamName": "setParameter.cursorTimeoutMillis",
                "Status": 1,
                "Tips": [

                ],
                "Unit": "",
                "ValueType": "integer"
            },
            {

                "Min": "0",

                "ParamName": "setParameter.maxTransactionLockRequestTimeoutMillis",
                "Status": 1,

                "Unit": "",

DescribeSlowLogPatterns.title: 查询数据库慢日志统计信息

DescribeSlowLogs.document: 以下示例为获取一实例的慢日志信息。
DescribeSlowLogs.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeSlowLogs
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "abc",
    "StartTime": "2020-09-22 00:00:00",
    "EndTime": "2020-09-22 00:00:00",
    "SlowMS": 1,
    "Offset": 1,
    "Limit": 1,
    "Format": "abc"
}
DescribeSlowLogs.output:
{
    "Response": {
        "Count": 20,
        "RequestId": "3a36aa6e-67e2-42a9-adfe-fc694334cc78",
        "SlowLogs": [
            "Mon Apr 20 13:55:21.623 I COMMAND  [conn16903] command admin.$cmd command: _flushRoutingTableCacheUpdates { forceRoutingTableRefresh: \"config.system.sessions\", maxTimeMS: 30000, $clusterTime: { clusterTime: Timestamp(1587362114, 1), signature: { hash: BinData(0, 259955995BDC7E0CA35C4276EB23341C03910A48), keyId: 6817613949303783443 } }, $configServerState: { opTime: { ts: Timestamp(1587362108, 1), t: 1 } }, $db: \"admin\" } numYields:0 reslen:288 locks:{ Global: { acquireCount: { r: 4 } }, Database: { acquireCount: { r: 2 } }, Collection: { acquireCount: { r: 2 } } } protocol:op_msg 5335ms",

}

Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com

InquirePriceCreateDBInstances.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: InquirePriceCreateDBInstances
<公共请求参数>

{
    "GoodsNum": "2",
    "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-4",
    "Memory": "4",
    "Period": "1",
    "ClusterType": "REPLSET",
    "Volume": "100",
    "NodeNum": "3",
    "ReplicateSetNum": "1",
    "MachineCode": "HIO10G",
    "MongoVersion": "MONGO_36_WT"
}

ModifyDBInstanceNetworkAddress.document: 修改云数据库实例的VIP信息
ModifyDBInstanceNetworkAddress.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceNetworkAddress
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-9d0p****",
    "OldIpExpiredTime": 1,
    "NetworkAddresses": [
        {
            "NewIPAddress": "10.0.0.10",
            "OldIpAddress": "10.0.0.1"
        }
    ],
    "NewUniqVpcId": "vpc-gfb3pqo1",
    "NewUniqSubnetId": "ins-wsdn61fw"
}
ModifyDBInstanceNetworkAddress.title: 修改云数据库实例网络信息

ModifyDBInstanceParamTpl.title: 修改参数

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.document: 调整云数据库实例配置
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceSpec
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-p8vn****",
    "Volume": "250",
    "Memory": "4"
}
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.title: 调整云数据库实例配置

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.document: 广州二区和三区共删除2个从节点，最终节点数量变更为3
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceSpec
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-abcdef",
    "Memory": 4,
    "Volume": 100,
    "OplogSize": 30,
    "NodeNum": 3,
    "ReplicateSetNum": 1,
    "InMaintenance": 1,
    "RemoveNodeList": [
        {
            "NodeName": "cmgo-3iecwbfx_0-node0",
            "Role": "SECONDARY",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-2"
        },
        {
            "NodeName": "cmgo-3iecwbfx_0-node1",
            "Role": "SECONDARY",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3"
        }
    ]
}
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.title: 删除mognodb云数据库实例从节点

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.document: 广州二区和三区共新增2个从节点，最终节点数量变更为5
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceSpec
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-abcdef",
    "Memory": 4,
    "Volume": 100,
    "OplogSize": 30,
    "NodeNum": 5,
    "ReplicateSetNum": 1,
    "InMaintenance": 1,
    "AddNodeList": [
        {
            "Role": "SECONDARY",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-2"
        },
        {
            "Role": "SECONDARY",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3"
        }
    ]
}
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.title: 新增mognodb云数据库实例从节点

ModifyInstanceParams.title: 修改mongoDB实例参数
